frequency_offset.description:
A super set range for line and client side carrier, specific sub-range is depend on application. Frequency-offset can be used for bright tuning
   of the wavelengths.
   Once set, the frequency will slowly change (over 1-10s) without affecting service.

pre_fec_q_sig_deg_threshold.description:
The threshold based on which the PRE-FEC-Q-SIGNAL-DEGRADE alarm is raised.
   0 implies threshold crossing alarming disabled.
   Specific sub-range is per carrier use-case.

pre_fec_q_sig_deg_hysteresis.description: Hysteresis to account for raising of the PRE-FEC-Q-SIGNAL-DEGRADE alarm.

tx_cd.description: The configured transmit pre-compensation chromatic dispersion.

post_fec_q_sig_deg_threshold.description: The threshold based on which the POST-FEC-Q-SIGNAL-DEGRADE alarm is raised.

post_fec_q_sig_deg_hysteresis.description: Hysteresis to account for raising of the POST-FEC-Q-SIGNAL-DEGRADE alarm.

enable_advanced_parameters.description: Controls enabling/disabling of configuring advanced parameters for this object.

admin_state.description: The administrative state of the managed object.

alarm_report_control.description: Controls the reporting of alarms for this particular object.

frequency.description: Frequency of the optical channel, expressed in MHz

target_output_power.description:
Target output optical power level of the optical channel,
expressed in increments of 0.01 dBm (decibel-milliwats)
